publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-107.1 Mr Brian Monteith: National Cultural Strategy—As an amendment to motion (S1M-107) in the name of Mr Sam Galbraith, leave out all from "in all" to end and insert "is the product of our nation’s artistic, political and economic history and the spontaneous and independent contributions of individuals and organisations and that the role of the Scottish Executive should be to preserve and promote our historical record and artistic achievements and to foster an open society where new contributions can be made without requiring political endorsement."
